NN Additional Losses docs
************************************************

.. note:: This is a code documentation which contains losses which are not part of the standard pytorch libary. For installation and usage read the README in `github repo <https://github.com/shayansiddiqui/nn-additional-losses>`_

   :maxdepth: 2
